title: Empress Myeongseong
summary: Empress Myeongseong or Empress Myung-Sung (17 November 1851 – 8 October 1895[1]), known informally as Queen Min, was the first official wife of Gojong, the twenty-sixth king of Joseon and the first emperor of the Korean Empire. She was posthumously called as Myeongseong, the Great Empress (명성태황후, 明成太皇后).
